Welcome to the page for the Phonetics Studio at York University! 

<br> This is a specialized area on campus where students can conduct research regarding acoustic analysis of spoken language and speech perception. Our studio and its equipment are used by students from multiple programs including Linguistics, Psychology, and Cognitive Science here at York.
